content.query:
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[UpsertCognitiveReport]    Script Date: 06-12-2021 17:47:44 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO

SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROC [dbo].[UpsertClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData] AS
BEGIN
Update
de
SET
  de.id= ld.id
, de.keyphrases= ld.keyphrases
, de.sentiment= ld.sentiment
, de.text= ld.text
, de.entities = ld.entities
FROM dbo.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData de
INNER JOIN Load.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData ld ON ld.id = de.id

Insert INTO dbo.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData 
(
	id
,	keyphrases
,	sentiment
,	text
,	entities
)
SELECT
	ld.id
,	ld.keyphrases
,	ld.sentiment
,	ld.text
,	ld.entities
FROM Load.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData ld
LEFT JOIN dbo.ClaimFraudAnalyzedAIMLData de ON ld.id = de.id
WHERE de.id is null

END

GO
